title: National Level Hackathon 360 2.0
location: St. Joseph's College of Engineering, Chennai
description: A 24-hour national-level hackathon as part of the Jet'25 technical symposium. A platform for students to showcase their innovative ideas.
longDescription: Participate in Hackathon 360 2.0, a premier 24-hour national-level coding competition hosted by St. Joseph's College of Engineering, Chennai. As a key event of the Jet'25 technical symposium, this hackathon invites students from across the country to solve real-world problems, innovate, and showcase their technical prowess. It's an opportunity to collaborate, learn from peers, and win exciting prizes.

title: Sprintathon
description: A national-level 24-hour hackathon that brings together the brightest minds to solve real-world challenges.
longDescription: Sprintathon is a high-intensity, national-level 24-hour hackathon held at IITM Research Park. This event provides a platform for students, developers, and innovators to collaborate, ideate, and build solutions for pressing real-world problems. Participants will get the chance to network with industry experts, win exciting prizes, and bring their innovative ideas to life in a competitive and energetic environment.

title: Build-a-thon
description: A collaborative event focused on building open-source tools for social good. Contribute to meaningful projects.
longDescription: Join the Build-a-thon and use your skills to make a difference. This event brings together developers to contribute to open-source projects that address social and environmental challenges. It's less of a competition and more of a collaboration, with a focus on learning, community, and impact.
